name: VR Castle Sim
description:
Welcome to VR Castle Sim, a Complete VR Experience.
Works with Google Cardboard.

What’s possible?

First visit the outside of the Castle and enjoy an immersive virtual reality experience, been there you can walk around and enjoy the view from the tower, in addition you can collect objects and earn points.

Later, enter in the Castle and visit the garden, also visit all the rooms at different levels and enter the underground, in addition find other objects to earn more points.

This VR Game was designed with a VR Viewer Device use in Mind, mainly with the use of Google Cardboard Compatible Viewer, but it also can be played in regular 3D mode, for better VR experience we recommend wearing headphones. There is no need of external controls to play this game, it uses a no touch interactivity technology.

**You can also use the Cardboard Button to activate auto walk.

Have Fun!
